Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: First the user has two parts Normative Process Behavior strict rules and Desiderata recommended but not strict I need to analyze the event log based on these

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: Normative Rules Strict Sequence Application Received Credit Check Risk Assessment Loan Decision Inform Applicant If Approved Finalize Documentation Close Case Specific ordering Credit Check before Risk Assessment Risk Assessment before Loan Decision Inform Applicant after Loan Decision If approved Finalize Documentation before Close Case If rejected do not finalize documentation Not allowed Skipping steps reversing order finalizing docs after rejection closing case without following logic

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: Desiderata Recommended Credit Check within 24 hours of Application Received Inform Applicant within 48 hours of Loan Decision Perform a Follow up Call before closing the case Violations are not serious

Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: Now the event log has three cases Case 1 Case 2 and Case 3

Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: I need to 1 Identify which cases violate normative rules and explain why 2 Identify which cases fail desiderata and explain noting theyre not severe 3 Suggest interpretations or justifications where possible

Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: Analyze Case 1 2024 01 10 0900 Application Received 0930 Credit Check 1000 Risk Assessment 1100 Loan Decision Approved 1300 Inform Applicant 1330 Finalize Documentation 1400 Close Case

Name: Validation - PE
Text: This follows the sequence perfectly Credit Check after Application Received Risk Assessment after Credit Check Loan Decision after Risk Assessment Inform Applicant after Loan Decision Finalize Documentation after Inform Applicant and since approved before Close Case Close Case last No violations of normative rules

Name: Validation - PE
Text: For desiderata Credit Check 0930 is within 24 hours of 0900 same day Inform Applicant Within 48 hours of Loan Decision at 1100 Informed at 1300 which is 2 hours later well within Follow up Call Not mentioned so probably not done but its just recommended

Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: Case 2 2024 01 11 0800 Application Received 0820 Risk Assessment This is before Credit Check Violates Risk Assessment must be after Credit Check 0900 Credit Check 0930 Loan Decision Rejected 1000 Finalize Documentation This is after rejection Not allowed 1030 Close Case

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: Violations Risk Assessment before Credit Check Skips the order Finalize Documentation after rejection Explicitly not allowed So normative violations in Case 2

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: Desiderata Not relevant since there are normative violations but lets check Credit Check at 0900 is within 24 hours of 0800 Inform Applicant Wait its not in the log The sequence requires Inform Applicant after Loan Decision but its missing The normative rules say Loan Decision Inform Applicant In Case 2 after Loan Decision at 0930 next is Finalize Documentation at 1000 then Close Case Is Inform Applicant skipped The log doesnt have it That might be another violation Checking the log For Case 2 activities Application Received Risk Assessment Credit Check Loan Decision Finalize Documentation Close Case No Inform Applicant So thats a skip in the sequence Inform Applicant must occur after Loan Decision

Name: Validation - PE
Text: Additional normative violation Skipping Inform Applicant Follow up Call Not mentioned

Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: Case 3 2024 01 12 0900 Application Received 2024 01 14 1000 Credit Check This is more than 24 hours later From Jan 12 0900 to Jan 14 1000 is about 2 days 1100 Risk Assessment 1200 Loan Decision Approved 2024 01 16 1500 Inform Applicant Loan Decision on Jan 14 1200 Inform on Jan 16 1500 From Jan 14 1200 to Jan 16 1500 is about 2 days and 3 hours which is more than 48 hours 2024 01 17 0900 Finalize Documentation 2024 01 17 1000 Close Case No Follow up Call

Name: Validation - PE
Text: Sequence check Application Received Credit Check after though late Risk Assessment Loan Decision Inform Applicant Finalize Documentation Close Case All in order no skips or reverses Since approved Finalize Documentation before Close Case Yes No normative violations the delays are just desiderata

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: Desiderata violations Credit Check not within 24 hours Inform Applicant not within 48 hours of Loan Decision No Follow up Call

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: Summary 1 Normative Violations Case 2 Risk Assessment before Credit Check Finalize Documentation after rejection Possibly skipping Inform Applicant if its required and not done

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: 2 Desiderata Failures Case 1 Possibly no Follow up Call Case 3 Credit Check 24 hours Inform Applicant 48 hours No Follow up Call

Name: Abductive Reasoning - PE
Text: 3 SuggestionsJustifications For Case 2 The out of order activities might be due to human error or system glitch Finalizing documentation after rejection could be a mistake in process execution For Case 3 Delays might be due to weekends holidays or high workload which are understandable but should be minimized

Name: Heuristic Reasoning - PE
Text: Structure my response First address Task 1 Identify normative violations Second Task 2 Identify desiderata failures Third Task 3 Suggest interpretations
